author: David Brennan, Tom O'Connor, Naveed Jamali
title: NATO States May Give Sanctuary to Fleeing Ukraine Forces as Russia Advances
description: An Estonian Foreign Ministry spokesperson told Newsweek that all Ukrainians—whether in civilian clothes or in uniform—will be allowed to enter the country.
